snippet.title: Sherlock Holmes: The Mystery of the Mummy
snippet.description:
iPad: http://bigfi.sh/15z7V7H
iPhone: http://bigfi.sh/152KN4Q

• THE BRILLIANT DUO ARE ON TO THEIR NEXT MYSTERY! 
Solve a mystery involving the disappearance of Lord Montcalfe, a famous archaeologist specializing in ancient Egyptology. 

• THE MANSION IS PROTECTED BY EGYPTIAN MAGIC! 
The mansion is like a museum full of stunning artifacts and secrets. Go forward to the heart of the sanctuary and discover the mystery of the mummy 

• PACKED WITH PUZZLES TO SOLVE 
With all sorts of Egyptian theme puzzles to work through you will have hours of gameplay at your fingertips! 

• CAN YOU CLEAR UP THE MYSTERY OF THE MUMMY? 
A mummy is loose in the museum and is causing all sorts of trouble for Sherlock and Watson. Help them to figure out how to put a stop to this rampage!
